snippet.title: Pyrene - Official Gameplay Trailer | OTK Games Expo 2024
snippet.description:
Here's your look at gameplay from Pyrene in this trailer for the upcoming roguelike deck builder game. Pyrene will be available in September 2024 on PC and Mac (via Steam), and a demo is available now on Steam.

Unite with your fellow villagers to confront the sinister Demon Herensuge and his horde of hellish fiends, hell-bent on shattering the tranquility of our homeland. Use your deck-building skills to make it out of the unforgiving dungeons of the Pyrenees alive.

#Gaming #Games #GameTrailers
